items.name: Accomplice's Gloves

Each round: Equip 2 random Support items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

items.desc:
Combat start: Gain different bonuses based on starting position.

Front Two Rows: 40 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain 1 Mana when struck by an attack.

Back Two Rows: 15 Ability Power. Gain 10 Mana every 3 seconds.

+AR & MR
Back Rows
Bouns AP & Mana

can crit and

critical dmg

items.name: Cybercoil
items.desc:
Abilities and Attacks mark enemies for 8 seconds. Heal for 10% of damage dealt to marked enemies.

Recommended users: Sejuani, Jax, and Mordekaiser

items.name: Flux Capacitor
items.desc:
Attacks store charge. At 4 charges, the next attack consumes the charges to deal 8% of the target's max health as physical damage and reduces their Armor by 10.

Recommended users: Zeri and Naafiri

items.name: Hyper Fangs
items.desc:
When you damage an enemy, store 30% of your damage dealt to them. After 4 seconds, deal the stored damage to the target and the nearest enemy as physical damage.

Recommended users: Naafiri, Jhin, and Varus

items.name: Tornadoes
items.desc: Every 6 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion spawns a whirl of Tornadoes, dealing magic damage.

items.name: The Annihilator
items.desc: At 6 seconds, The Annihilator deals percent max Health true damage once.

items.name: Ani-Mines
items.desc: Every 5 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion throws three Ani-Mines that explode, dealing physical damage in an area.

items.name: Final City Transit
items.desc: Every few seconds, Final City Transit summons trains that run through the battlefield, dealing devastating damage and carrying away low health enemies.

items.name: Blade-o-rang
items.desc: Every 4 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion throws a returning Blade-o-rang that deals physical damage, increased for the first target hit.

items.name: Searing Shortbow
items.desc: Every 5 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion fires Searing Shortbow, shooting an arrow that leaves an area that deals magic damage over time.

items.name: Gatling Bunny-Guns
items.desc: Every 5.5 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion fires Gatling Bunny-Guns in a long cone, dealing high physical damage.

items.name: Guiding Hex
items.desc: Every 4 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion casts Guiding Hex, dealing magic damage to 3 random nearby targets.

items.name: Surprise Supply Drop
items.desc: Every 8 seconds, Supply Drop calls in a support ship that drops powerful goodies onto the battlefield.

items.name: UwU Blasters
items.desc: Every 4 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion rapidfires UwU Blasters, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit.

items.name: Vortex Glove
items.desc: Every 5 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion fires piercing orbs from Vortex Glove, that deal magic damage, reduced for each enemy struck.

items.name: Pulse Silencer
items.desc:
Execute enemies below 44% Health. Abilities can critically strike.Gain 44% Critical Strike Damage.

Recommended users: Jhin and Zeri

items.name: Hijacked Cybercoil
items.desc:
Abilities and Attacks mark enemies for 10 seconds. Heal for 75% of damage dealt to marked enemies.

Recommended users: Sejuani, Jax, and Mordekaiser

items.name: Fully-Charged Flux Capacitor
items.desc:
Every other attack is charged, dealing 20% of the target's max health as physical damage and reduces their Armor by 15.

Recommended users: Zeri and Naafiri

items.name: Nullifier Lantern
items.desc:
Gain 50% health. Every 1 seconds, deal 10% of the holder's max health as magic damage to all enemies within 1-hex.

Recommended users: Jax, Mordekaiser, and Sejuani

items.name: Harmonized Chassis
items.desc:
All Shields are 100% more effective on the holder.Every second, siphon 8% of the owner's max Health from the nearest 3 enemies and convert it to a Shield for 8 seconds.

Recommended users: Mordekaiser, Jax, and Sejuani

items.name: Apex-Fangs
items.desc:
When you damage an enemy, deal 100% of the damage to the nearest enemy as physical damage after a brief delay.

Recommended users: Naafiri, Jhin, and Varus

items.name: Scoped Holobow
items.desc:
Attacks that Critically Strike grant 10 bonus Mana. After casting an Ability, gain 100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.

Recommended users: Varus, Jhin, and Zeri
items.fromDesc:
+40 Ability Power
+30 Mana
+20% Attack Speed
+15% Attack Damage

items.name: The Indomitable
items.desc: If you were a Deep Roots Anomaly enjoyer during Into the Arcane, look no further than this Artifact. Indomitable Gauntlet is also our new and more generic tank option for Artifacts now that Anima Visage is out.
